title: Grateful Dead Live at Soldier Field on 1994-07-24
source: AKG C391 ORTF in hat FOB 18th row Left Center>Teac DAP20 @ 16/48; DAT Master>Lynx Studio 1>Wavelab 3.0; Weiss Saracon SRC (all sample rate conversions). FLAC'd using Audiofile Engineering Sample Manager. Recorded by Dave Cohen and Justin Lee
